About Us

FUSESTAR ELECTRICAL has been in business serving our clients for over 10 years. We have provided services to many industries including Oil, Gas, Coal and Uranium. We can provide Power Construction as well as Design and Startup. We pride ourselves in efficient, cost effective service. Our involvement with Industrial and Commercial Building Projects throughout the Region is equally significant.

With Over 10 Years Of Experience In This Business.

The Personnel at FUSESTAR ELECTRICAL are highly trained and experienced. Our Company’s expertise does not end with the successful completion of your Electrical Installation – We can provide you with Follow-Up and Preventative Maintenance Services.

Whether it’s a single urgent service call, or total turnkey design-build project, Fusestar Electrical stands ready to serve you!

Do You Need Any Requirement For Electrical Repair Or Maintenance?

Whether we are working for a Residential Service Customer or installing a sophisticated Control System for an Industrial Customer, we take pride in delivering the quality our clients expect. After completion, we stand behind the quality of our work providing immediate response on warranties and electrical system maintenance.

CONTACT US TODAY     (+234) 708 432 935     dominicudofia@gmail.com

Fusestar provides you with experienced supervisors and skilled craftsmen who work with us on a continuing basis. As a result, we deliver quality, efficiency, and on-schedule performance that we are proud to stand behind.
